rows.label: qst201308_msg0001
rows.name: How did it go? Did you find any leads?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0002
rows.name:
No, unfortunately... We were unable
to obtain any useful information.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0004
rows.name:
I asked around as well, but couldn't
get any new information either...

rows.label: qst201308_msg0005
rows.name:
If we don't find Shamal...
I just can't imagine...

rows.label: qst201308_msg0007
rows.name:
We will find the children. So please,
just give us a little more time.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0008
rows.name: Thank you. We're counting on you!

rows.label: qst201308_msg0009
rows.name:
Many people come and go from
Avaritia. They may have been
taken to another nation.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0010
rows.name:
If they can't be found on
Goldmund, small as it is, then
we should search other nations.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0011
rows.name:
However, having the Driver travel
from place to place will take time.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0012
rows.name:
I would like to use the power of
the mercenary group to gather
information. Would that be acceptable?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0016
rows.name:
An excellent proposal.
Can you handle it?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0013
rows.name:
Leave it to me. I will contact
you as soon as I have a lead.
